---
id: describe-organization-quotas
title: "Describe organization quotas"
description: "Retrieves the resource quotas and usage limits for the organization identified by the given `orgId`. Quotas define resource limits for pipelines, compute environments, and other platform features."
sidebar_label: "Describe organization quotas"
hide_title: true

sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Describe organization quotas"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/orgs/{orgId}/quotas"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the resource quotas and usage limits for the organization identified by the given `orgId`. Quotas define resource limits for pipelines, compute environments, and other platform features.
